channel.title: Credit Cards on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Credit Cards on FinanClub

item.title: HOOD
item.description: score:49 Chances: Robinhood’s launch of a new credit card with attractive features like 3% cash back on all purchases and no annual fee is likely to attract millions of new customers to the platform. Risks: The reliance on market-sensitive trading revenue may still pose a risk to Robinhood, despite the expansion of its product offerings.
